quiz.question: What is the main idea behind Bubble Sort?
options: Divide the array into halves recursively
Repeatedly swap adjacent elements if they are in the wrong order
Insert each element into its correct position
Select the smallest element and move it to the front
quiz.answer: Repeatedly swap adjacent elements if they are in the wrong order

quiz.question: What is the time complexity of Bubble Sort in the best case?
Bubble Sort is stable. True or False?
Which optimization can improve Bubble Sort’s performance?
options: Stop early if no swaps occur in a pass
quiz.answer: Stop early if no swaps occur in a pass

quiz.question: In Bubble Sort, how many passes are required to sort an array of n elements in the worst case?
